author: Special Correspondent
text:
Ahead of the All India NR Congress releasing its candidates’ list, its sitting MLA P. Karthikeyan, who represents Ossudu constituency, on Tuesday asserted that he will seek re-election from there.

Mr.Karthikeyan is campaigning door-to-door in the constituency and expressed the hope that the party leadership would give him the seat in spite of several new aspirants vying for the constituency.

Talking to The Hindu , he said, “I am still with the AINRC and hopeful that the party leadership will allot the seat to me again. I had a discussion with party president and Chief Minister N.Rangasamy. He has said he would consult all and decide. So far there is no indication that the seat will be denied to me. ”

“I am still with AINRC,” says Karthikeyan, who is campaigning
title: Hoping to contest again from Ossudu: MLA
